Summary Note:
The RM has known Fischer Zimmermann Herrmann since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
With a career spanning nearly 27 years, Fischer Zimmermann Herrmann has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Fischer Zimmermann Herrmann is currently widowed. His children are named Henriette, Wolf and Hoffmann.
Education Background:
In 1991, Fischer graduated from Albert-Einstein-Gymnasium Ulm with a secondary school diploma.
Fischer pursued higher education at Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich, graduating in 1998.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 27 years, Fischer Zimmermann Herrmann has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Fischer Zimmermann Herrmann's first role was as a Drilling Engineer at RWE AG, where he worked diligently from 1998 to 1999 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Reservoir Engineer at Wintershall DEA GmbH in 1999, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 460000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns flat in Leipzig, where he resides. It is worth 1020000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 4360000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Investment Banker, in 2011.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
